title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release 2d - Maruti Suzuki adds 30MWp solar capacity; targets 319MWp by FY31 with INR 925 crore investment.
date: 2d - Maruti Suzuki adds 30MWp solar capacity; targets 319MWp by FY31 with INR 925 crore investment.

title: Maruti Suzuki Production Volume: May 2025 2 Jun - Maruti Suzuki produced 195,882 vehicles in May 2025, up from 193,207 in May 2024.
date: 2 Jun - Maruti Suzuki produced 195,882 vehicles in May 2025, up from 193,207 in May 2024.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release 2 Jun - Maruti Suzuki sold 180,077 units in May 2025, including 138,690 domestic and 31,219 export units.
date: 2 Jun - Maruti Suzuki sold 180,077 units in May 2025, including 138,690 domestic and 31,219 export units.

title: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance 28 May - Maruti Suzuki's FY25 Secretarial Compliance Report confirms full regulatory compliance, no violations.
date: 28 May - Maruti Suzuki's FY25 Secretarial Compliance Report confirms full regulatory compliance, no violations.

title: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 25 May - NCLAT hearing for Maruti Suzuki's CCI case scheduled on 15th July 2025.
date: 25 May - NCLAT hearing for Maruti Suzuki's CCI case scheduled on 15th July 2025.
